RACE.RACE_TEXT: Cherry Creek Futurity Trial ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 1 350 Y Dirt CR: 64. Futurity Trial Purse 2900. FOR COLORADO BRED TWO YEAR OLDS REMAINING ELIGIBLE TO THE TRIALS. Weight 124lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIANCAS FLARE broke in, bumped, late run. LIEBRITA steady drive for place. PS MISS DAISY speed, out kicked. EL FRENITO broke out, chased leaders. SEPARTIST KICKER foe crossed path. EL CAPITAN LEW bumped, steadied after break.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Cherry Creek Futurity Trial ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 2 350 Y Dirt CR: 66. Futurity Trial Purse 2900. FOR COLORADO BRED TWO YEAR OLDS REMAINING ELIGIBLE TO THE TRIALS. Weight 124lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIX GOOD KICKS much the best. CRYSTAL N DIAMOND dueled, game second. INTEREST IN UR EYES dueled, out kicked. YM RAVIN DASH veer out, ducked out. TRUMMPY hopped start.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Cherry Creek Futurity Trial ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 3 350 Y Dirt CR: 66. Futurity Trial Purse 2900. FOR COLORADO BRED TWO YEAR OLDS REMAINING ELIGIBLE TO THE TRIALS. Weight 124lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRST SWEETS bumped, steady drive. DON ARTURO C speed, veer in, bothered foe. LITTLE WAGON late surge for show. APOLLITICAL STREAKIN broke in, bumped, checked late. PAR T CROWD lost footing late. BRAVE PANTHER DG hopped start. A STEWARD INQUIRY WAS POSTED INTO THE RUNNING NEAR THE SIXTEENTH POLE, ALSO A JOCKEY OBJECTION WAS POSTED, THE JOCKEY OF APOLLITICAL STREAKIN CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST THE JOCKEY OF DON ARTURO C, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW THE CLAIM OF FOUL WAS ALLOWED AND DON ARTURO C WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM SECOND TO FOURTH FOR INTERFERENCE NEAR THE SIXTEENTH POLE.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Cherry Creek Futurity Trial ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 4 350 Y Dirt CR: 66. Futurity Trial Purse 2900. FOR COLORADO BRED TWO YEAR OLDS REMAINING ELIGIBLE TO THE TRIALS. Weight 124lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STOLINDREAM broke out, late surge. UNWAVERING late run, lost nod. SCHEDULE ME A ZOOM speed, outnodded. ALL INTHE AVERAGE early speed, no kick. XO GRACE broke out, veered in.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Cherry Creek Futurity Trial ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 5 350 Y Dirt CR: 65. Futurity Trial Purse 2900. FOR COLORADO BRED TWO YEAR OLDS REMAINING ELIGIBLE TO THE TRIALS. Weight 124lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LA CORONEL popped and gone. A BEAUTIFUL FLARE game 2nd. EXCITED MISSY brief foot, drift out. FURIA CARTEL shied from rival. MAY WE ALL lunged start, tried to buck.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Lucille Rowe Derby Trial ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 6 350 Y Dirt CR: 78. Derby Trial Purse 2900. FOR COLORADO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS REMAINING ELIGIBLE TO THE TRIALS. Weight 124lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COUNTRY ROCKET FOOSE awkward start, late push. MALALA speed, out kicked. LIGHTNING JESS broke in, late effort. BIG TIME APOLLI brief foot, solid try. MS VOLCAN reluctant, broke out. IVYCANTOO off slow.

ENTRY.NAME: Big Time Apolli
ENTRY.OWNER: Silva Alejandro and Flores Luis Fernando

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Lucille Rowe Derby Trial ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 7 350 Y Dirt CR: 76. Derby Trial Purse 2900. FOR COLORADO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS REMAINING ELIGIBLE TO THE TRIALS. Weight 124lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KISS FOR MONEY driving finish. CORONAS FOR IVORY speed, outfinished. DIABOLICAL CLYDE hopped start, game 3rd. CHAVELAS BEST CARD dueled, late kick. SPLASH TRAIN mid pack duel. DG TIME FOR IVORY mid pack duel. DG RAREST GLORY broke out sharply.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Lucille Rowe Derby Trial ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 8 350 Y Dirt CR: 78. Derby Trial Purse 2900. FOR COLORADO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS REMAINING ELIGIBLE TO THE TRIALS. Weight 124lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RARE CREEK strong finish. CARTEL MONEY dueled, gamely. FEARLESS FORTITUDE bobbled start, dueled, out kicked. EYE ON PANAMA steady effort. MY BABY dueled, drifted in. GLADIADOR SPECIAL ducked out late, lost rider, walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Gladiador Special
ENTRY.COMMENT: ducked out late, lost rider, walked off
